content: these fingerless wo man mitts knit up quickly with just one skein of yarn and the pattern is free what are you waiting for if you enjoy knitting my free patterns please consider making a donation to the mendocino theatre company 1 a 501 c 3 non-profit community theatre dedicated to producing plays of substance and excitement on the mendocino coast of california thank you 1 http //mendocinotheatre tix com/donation aspx orgnum=2367
